commands.gv: Re-select last selected block of text

commands.setSpellEnUs: Turn on US English spell checking
commands.closeBrackets: Move to next misspelled word after the cursor
commands.openBrackets: Move to previous misspelled word before the cursor
commands.z=: Suggest spellings for the word under/after the cursor
commands.zu: Suggest words for bad word under cursor from spell file
